sys_ui_script.name: x_821667_my_widget.drawPieChart

sys_update_version.name: sys_ui_script_4a48953697903110cbf53e2e6253afbb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>x_821667_my_widget.drawPieChart</name><script><![CDATA[var x_821667_my_widget = x_821667_my_widget || {};

x_821667_my_widget.drawPieChart = (function() {
	"use strict";
	console.log("leandro: x_821667_my_widget.drawPieChart");
	google.charts.load('current', {packages: ['corechart']});
    google.charts.setOnLoadCallback(drawChart);

    function drawChart() {
      // Define the chart to be drawn.
      var data = new google.visualization.DataTable();
      data.addColumn('string', 'Element');
      data.addColumn('number', 'Percentage');
      data.addRows([
        ['Nitrogen', 0.78],
        ['Oxygen', 0.21],
        ['Other', 0.01]
      ]);

      // Instantiate and draw the chart.
      var chart = new google.visualization.PieChart(document.getElementById('myPieChart'));
      chart.draw(data, null);
    }

/* set your private variables and functions here. For example: 
	var privateVar = 0; 
	function private_function() {
		return ++privateVar;
	}
*/

/* Share variables between multiple UI scripts by adding them to your scope object. For example: 
	x_821667_my_widget.sharedVar = 0; 

 Then access them in your scripts the same way. For example: 
	function get_shared() {
		return x_821667_my_widget.sharedVar;
	}
*/

	return {

/* set your public API here. For example:
		incrementAndReturnPrivateVar: function() {
			return private_function();
		},
*/
		type:  "drawPieChart"
	};
})();
]]></script><script_name>drawPieChart</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-31 14:03:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a48953697903110cbf53e2e6253afbb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_821667_my_widget.drawPieChart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Widgets" source="x_821667_my_widget">3d3b07fe971121109fd237971153affc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Widgets">3d3b07fe971121109fd237971153affc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_4a48953697903110cbf53e2e6253afbb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-31 14:11:00</sys_updated_on><ui_type>10</ui_type><use_scoped_format>true</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
